name: 20SecondsGame
description:
Created for the 20 Second Game Jam 2022

Your mission is to dodge the red squares for 20 seconds. Do you think you have the skills to do it? 

Controls:

WASD or key arrows to move the character.

Enter to select the desired option in the menu

ESC to restart the game

Enter to restart the game, either when you loose or win the game.

How To Download:

To download the game you need the java software installed in your computer. After downloaded right click the file and open with java.

Tools Used:

Created using eclipse

Java programming language

Sound Effect: BFXR software
